properties.description: Start testing how to make the risk_object. Starting on PA

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.t_crossreference',
	format: 'query') ~> tcross
source(output(
		icaobno as integer,
		icastdate as date,
		icaendate as date,
		icatotamt as long,
		icaourshare as decimal(28,10),
		icacadate as date,
		icaicaid as string,
		icachdate as date,
		icainaid as string,
		icaagaid as string,
		icapmlcurr as string,
		icapmlamt as long,
		icaeoamt as long,
		icaprovst as integer,
		icastat3 as string,
		icaintrate as decimal(28,10),
		icaintosprem as decimal(28,10),
		icaintcurr as string,
		icacrdate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select icaobno,\n		icastdate,\n		icaendate,\n		icatotamt,\n		icaourshare,\n		icacadate,\n		icaicaid,\n		icachdate,\n		icainaid,\n		icaagaid,\n		icapmlcurr,\n		icapmlamt,\n		icaeoamt,\n		icaprovst,\n		icastat3,\n		icaintrate,\n		icaintosprem,\n		icaintcurr,\n		icacrdate\nfrom dwh_stage.p_icatable',
	format: 'query') ~> ica
source(output(
		agaagaid as string,
		agastdate as date,
		agabusnsec as integer,
		agabusndiv as integer,
		agabusncla as integer,
		agastat2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 	agaagaid,\n		agastdate,\n		agabusnsec,\n		agabusndiv,\n		agabusncla,\n		agastat2\nfrom dwh_stage.p_agatable',
	format: 'query') ~> agatable
source(output(
		obbobno as integer,
		obbstdate as date,
		obbendate as date,
		obbcefoty as string,
		obbgrt as integer,
		obbname as string,
		obbclass as string,
		obbbuiltyear as short,
		obbdwt as integer,
		obbformt as integer,
		obbvesisolan as string,
		obbadr1 as string,
		obbsocity as string,
		obbnoofpax as integer,
		obbportunlid as string,
		obbvescod as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select obbobno,\n		obbstdate,\n		obbendate,\n		obbcefoty,\n		obbgrt,\n		obbname,\n		obbclass,\n		obbbuiltyear,\n		obbdwt,\n		obbformt,\n		obbvesisolan,\n		obbadr1,\n		obbsocity,\n		obbnoofpax,\n		obbportunlid,\n		obbvescod\nfrom dwh_stage.p_obbtable',
	format: 'query') ~> obbtable
source(output(
		obaobno as integer,
		obaimono as integer,
		obacallno as string,
		obaorgbui as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select obaobno,\n		obaimono,\n		obacallno,\n		obaorgbui\nfrom dwh_stage.p_obatable',
	format: 'query') ~> obatable
source(output(
		agreement_type as string,
		risk_group_code as string,
		risk_group_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select agreement_type, risk_group_code,\nrisk_group_desc from dwh_stage.sta_risk_group',
	format: 'query') ~> stariskgroup
source(output(
		imo as integer,
		year_of_build as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 	imo,\n		year_of_build \nfrom dwh_stage.lloyds_vessel',
	format: 'query') ~> lloydsevessel
source(output(
		vtg_key as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_sort as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_code as short,
		vtg_description as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_desc as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_desc as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_code as short,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_sort as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_vessel_type_group',
	format: 'query') ~> vesseltype
source(output(
		unlname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select unlname from dwh_stage.p_unltable',
	format: 'query') ~> unltable
tcross filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && 
code_type_id == 113) ~> AgreementType
AgreementType select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name=='target_code'||name=='target_description'||name=='source_code_key'),
			$$+'_agt' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefAgreementType
tcross filter(source_system=='PARIS' && 
 code_type_id== 106) ~> BusinessArea
BusinessArea select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name=='target_code'||name=='source_code_key'),
			$$+'_bua' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefBusinessArea
tcross filter(source_system== 'PARIS'  
&& code_type_id  == 45) ~> VesselSubType
VesselSubType select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name=='target_code'||name=='target_description'||name=='source_code_key'),
			$$+'_sub_type' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefVesselSubType
ica derive(icastdate_exchange = case(icastdate  > currentDate(),currentDate(),
case(icastdate < (toDate('01011978','dd/MM/yyyy')),toDate('01011978','dd/MM/yyyy'),icastdate))) ~> icastdateExchange
icaoba, obbtable join(obaobno == obbobno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> obaobb
obaobb filter((coalesce(icaendate,currentTimestamp()) > coalesce(obbstdate, addDays(currentTimestamp(), -36500))) &&
(coalesce(icaendate,currentTimestamp()) < coalesce(obbendate, addDays(currentTimestamp(), 36500)))) ~> icaendateobb
subtypevesseltype, agatable join(icaagaid == agaagaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> icaaga
agaAgtype derive(rob_vessel_type_3ltr = coalesce(target_code_sub_type,'N/A'),
		rob_vessel_type_desc = coalesce(target_description_sub_type,'Not Applicable'),
		rob_object_key = case(obaobno == toDecimal(null()),toString(null()),concat('P',toString(obaobno))),
		rob_vessel_name = case(trim(obbname)==toString(null()), 'NOT APPLICABLE',upper(obbname)),
		ggp_gard_group = case(trim(vtg_description) == toString(null()),'Not Applicable',substring(vtg_description,1,30)),
		rob_imono = obaimono,
		agreement_type = target_code_agt,
		agreement_type_desc = target_description_agt) ~> ExpressionRob
icaaga, xrefAgreementType join(toString(agabusndiv) == source_code_key_agt,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> agaAgtype
ExpressionRob, stariskgroup lookup(ExpressionRob@agreement_type == stariskgroup@agreement_type,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpStaRiskGroup
icaendateobb, xrefVesselSubType join(trim(upper(obbcefoty)) == trim(upper(source_code_key_sub_type)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> obbsubtype
LkpStaRiskGroup derive(gard_vsl_type_grp_code = case(in(['CHA','SQS'],ExpressionRob@agreement_type),ExpressionRob@agreement_type, 
case(in(['BU', 'OP', 'CO'],risk_group_code),risk_group_code, toString(null()))),
		gard_vsl_type_group_desc = case(in(['CHA','SQS'],ExpressionRob@agreement_type),agreement_type_desc, 
case(in(['BU', 'OP', 'CO'],risk_group_code),risk_group_code, toString(null())))) ~> ExpressionVslgrp
ExpressionVslgrp, lloydsevessel lookup(obaimono == imo,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpLoydsVessel
LkpLoydsVessel derive(built_year_calc = case(greatest(toInteger(coalesce(obbbuiltyear,0)),toInteger(coalesce(obaorgbui,0)))==0,case(isNull(year_of_build)==true(),
toInteger(toString(currentTimestamp(),'yyyy'))-10,toInteger(year_of_build)),
greatest(toInteger(obbbuiltyear),toInteger(obaorgbui)))) ~> ExpressionBuiltYearCalc
ExpressionBuiltYearCalc derive(vessel_age = ((toInteger(toString(currentTimestamp(),'yyyy'))-built_year_calc)
- (6 - (toInteger(toString(currentTimestamp(),'MM'))/12)))) ~> ExpVesselAge
icastdateExchange, obatable join(icaobno == obaobno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> icaoba
obbsubtype, dimvesseltype join(target_code_sub_type == vtg_key,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> subtypevesseltype
vesseltype select(mapColumn(
		vtg_key,
		vtg_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimvesseltype
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		rob_object_key,
		rob_vessel_type_3ltr,
		rob_vessel_type_desc,
		rob_vessel_name,
		ggp_gard_group,
		rob_imono,
		rob_vessel_age = vessel_age,
		rob_tonnage_dw = obbdwt,
		rob_tonnage_gross = obbgrt,
		rob_signal_letters = obacallno,
		rob_no_of_passengers = obbnoofpax,
		rob_built_year = obbbuiltyear,
		rob_built_year_calc = built_year_calc,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_int_code = gard_vsl_type_grp_code,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_int_desc = gard_vsl_type_group_desc,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_ext_code = gard_vsl_type_grp_code,
		rob_port_of_registry,
		rob_class = target_code_class,
		rob_class_desc = target_description_class,
		rob_flag = target_code_flag,
		rob_flag_desc = target_description_flag,
		rob_mou_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> tmp
tcross select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name=='target_code'||name=='target_description'||name=='source_code_key'||name=='source_system'||name=='code_type_id'),
			$$+'_flag' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefFlag
tcross select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name=='target_code'||name=='target_description'||name=='source_code_key'||name=='source_system'||name=='code_type_id'),
			$$+'_class' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefclass
constant, xrefFlag lookup(source_system == source_system_flag
	&& obbvesisolan == source_code_key_flag
	&& code_type_id_100_flag == code_type_id_flag,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> flag
ExpVesselAge derive(code_type_id_100_flag = 100,
		code_type_id_108_class = 108,
		source_system = 'Paris',
		rob_mou_type = 'Not Applicable') ~> constant
flag, xrefclass lookup(source_system == source_system_class
	&& obbsocity == source_code_key_class
	&& code_type_id_108_class == toDecimal(source_code_key_class),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> class
class, unltable lookup(obbportunlid == unlname,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lkpunl
lkpunl derive(rob_port_of_registry = substring(unlname,1,60)) ~> DerivedColumn1
tmp alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		pk_key as string,
		rob_condition_desc as string,
		rob_risk_group_rsv_code as decimal(28,10),
		rob_vessel_age as decimal(28,10),
		rob_date_orig_end as date,
		rob_segment_code as string,
		rob_poolable_ind as string,
		rob_cover_limit_cgl_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ceding_company_code as decimal(28,10),
		rob_claims_lead_ind as string,
		rob_risk_group_code as string,
		rob_section_name as string,
		rob_ret_line as decimal(28,10),
		rob_section_type_desc as string,
		rob_vessel_name as string,
		rob_imono as string,
		rob_vessel_type_fp as string,
		rob_partial_interest as decimal(28,10),
		gard_vsl_type_grp_3_int_code as string,
		rob_co_line as decimal(28,10),
		deleted_ind as string,
		rob_condition_code as string,
		rob_expiry_rate_etc as decimal(28,10),
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_int_desc as string,
		rob_entered_tonnage as decimal(28,10),
		rob_exposure as decimal(28,10),
		rob_port_of_registry as string,
		rob_rr_annual_amount_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_cash_index as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ton_entered_our_share as decimal(28,10),
		rob_capital_branch_code as string,
		rob_epi_curr as string,
		rob_flag_desc as string,
		rob_date_first_inception as date,
		rob_date_start as date,
		ggp_gard_group as string,
		rob_ceding_comp_country_code as string,
		rob_cover_limit_main_curr as string,
		rob_ffo as string,
		rob_risk_group_sort as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ceding_comp_country_desc as string,
		rob_mutual_fixed as string,
		rob_cover_limit_dth_curr as string,
		rob_ded_amount_ice_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_reinsurance_type_code as string,
		rob_total_index as decimal(28,10),
		rob_date_user_removed as date,
		rob_ded_amount_daily_ind_curr as string,
		rob_cover_limit_main_stat as decimal(28,10),
		rob_epi_rate as decimal(28,10),
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_ext_desc as string,
		rob_main_limit_partial_org as decimal(28,10),
		gard_vsl_type_grp_3_ext_code as string,
		rob_sum_insured_os_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_days_machinery as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_curr as string,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_6_int_code as string,
		rob_re_line_fac as decimal(28,10),
		rob_entered_tonnage_pro_rata as decimal(28,10),
		rob_inapayer_name as string,
		rob_non_vessel_indicator as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		rob_currency_code as string,
		rob_risk_group_rsv_desc as string,
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_built_year_calc as decimal(28,10),
		rob_cover_limit_main_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_no_of_passengers as decimal(28,10),
		rob_cover_limit_dth_org as decimal(28,10),
		gard_vsl_type_grp_3_ext_desc as string,
		rob_reinstatement_rate as decimal(28,10),
		rob_reinsurance_pgm_desc as string,
		rob_object_category as string,
		rob_flag_code as string,
		rob_count_risk_days as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_amount_pa_curr as string,
		rob_class as string,
		rob_ded_amount_amd_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_gard_bermuda_nuf_ind as string,
		rob_ded_days_in_all as decimal(28,10),
		rob_rr_abatement_percent as decimal(28,10),
		rob_layer_desc as string,
		rob_cover_limit_cgl_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_reinsurance_pgm_code as string,
		rob_ded_amount_amd_curr as string,
		rob_sum_insured_os_curr as string,
		rob_expiry_rate as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_reinsurance_type as string,
		rob_re_line_war as decimal(28,10),
		rob_capital as string,
		rob_inapayer as decimal(28,10),
		rob_cover_limit_exh_date as date,
		rob_ceding_company_name as string,
		rob_claims_leader as string,
		rob_ded_days as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_amount_aad_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_cover_limit_defence_curr as string,
		rob_combined_single_limit_ind as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		rob_class_desc as string,
		rob_reinstatement_counts as decimal(28,10),
		rob_main_limit_partial_curr as string,
		rob_capital_branch_long_desc as string,
		rob_date_end as date,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_6_ext_desc as string,
		rob_ded_amount_amd_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_rr_pool_percent as decimal(28,10),
		rob_fac_cover_limit as decimal(28,10),
		rob_cover_limit_defence_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_rr_annual_amount_usd as decimal(28,10),
		ggp_key as string,
		rob_cover_limit_cgl_curr as string,
		rob_ded_amount_daily_ind as decimal(28,10),
		rob_segment_desc as string,
		rob_rr_broker_percent as decimal(28,10),
		rob_built_year as decimal(28,10),
		rob_rr_annual_amount_stat as decimal(28,10),
		rob_small_craft_ind as string,
		rob_sum_insured_os_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_our_line as decimal(28,10),
		rob_vessel_type_3ltr as string,
		rob_vessel_type_desc as string,
		rob_original_rate as decimal(28,10),
		rob_etc_broker_ind as string,
		rob_capital_branch_short_desc as string,
		rob_ded_amount_daily_ind_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_amount_aad_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_mou_type_miller as string,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_ext_code as string,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_6_ext_code as string,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_3_int_desc as string,
		rob_tonnage_gross as decimal(28,10),
		rob_cut_line as decimal(28,10),
		rob_tonnage_dw as decimal(28,10),
		rob_sub_limit_cc_indicator as string,
		rob_status as string,
		rob_mou_type as string,
		rob_date_registered as date,
		rob_warranty_days as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_amount_pa_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_business_type as string,
		rob_class2_desc as string,
		rob_risk_group_desc as string,
		rob_rr_market_ri_percent as decimal(28,10),
		rob_rating_method as string,
		rob_mou_location as string,
		rob_epi_premium as decimal(28,10),
		rob_date_last_expiry as date,
		rob_ded_amount_pa_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_main_limit_partial_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ri_vessel_type as string,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_int_code as string,
		rob_removed_ind as string,
		rob_layer_code as string,
		rob_reg_owner_name as string,
		rob_cover_limit_main_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_rdc as string,
		rob_ded_layer as string,
		rob_class2 as string,
		rob_signal_letters as string,
		rob_on_risk_ind as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		rob_ded_amount_ice_org as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_days_indemnity as decimal(28,10),
		rob_object_group as string,
		rob_section_type_code as string,
		rob_re_line as decimal(28,10),
		last_updated_by as string,
		rob_ded_amount_ice_curr as string,
		rob_cover_limit_defence_org as decimal(28,10),
		gard_vsl_type_grp_6_int_desc as string,
		rob_club_retention as decimal(28,10),
		rob_ded_amount_aad_curr as string,
		rob_object_key as string,
		rob_cover_limit_dth_usd as decimal(28,10),
		rob_capital_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['pk'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		rob_vessel_age,
		rob_vessel_name,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_int_desc,
		rob_port_of_registry,
		rob_flag_desc,
		ggp_gard_group,
		rob_built_year_calc,
		rob_no_of_passengers,
		rob_class,
		rob_class_desc,
		rob_built_year,
		rob_vessel_type_3ltr,
		rob_vessel_type_desc,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_ext_code,
		rob_tonnage_gross,
		rob_tonnage_dw,
		rob_mou_type,
		gard_vsl_type_grp_2_int_code,
		rob_signal_letters,
		rob_object_key
	)) ~> predimriskobjectvessel
